title: First Look: Fizik One-to-One Promises the Holy Grail of Bike Saddles for $499
content:
The Fizik One-to-One program is four years in the making, bringing the opportunity for all cyclists to ride a truly custom saddle, the shape of which is determined by the pressure mapping data collected while you're actually pedaling

Read the full article at First Look: Fizik One-to-One Promises the Holy Grail of Bike Saddles for $499 on Velo.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
